member.name: AXESLISTA
member.summary: The AXESLIST structure contains information on all the axes of a multiple master font.

member.name: AXESLISTA.axlNumAxes
member.summary: Number of axes for a specified multiple master font.

member.name: AXESLISTA.axlAxisInfo
member.summary: An array of structures. Each AXISINFO structure contains information on an axis of a specified multiple master font. This corresponds to the dvValues array in the structure.

member.name: AXESLISTA.axlAxisInfo
